##Very gently

WECHAT denganqing1984

Feature description, here, I will share my writing, reading the book.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
In the evening, when I was cleaning the table with my mother, I talked about the Jade Phoenix.
Because when I went for a walk on the Yangtze River embankment in the evening, I passed by my family's old house and saw Yufengniang standing on the ground with her hands in a daze. I call her, she exulted loudly asked: "Qing Er, you back? " I said yes, she asked: "You back how long? I did not see you. " I said nearly a month.

She nodded and smiled. "I forgot you are at the end of the new house now, and I can't even see you. " By the count, I haven't seen her for nearly three years. At first glance, I felt that she had shrunk a lot, her face had become loose and her eyes were unfocused, his hands were shaking when he spoke.
After catching up with her, I went to the LEVEE. Standing on the dikes and looking back at us, the sun shone down and the undulating roofs glowed. Front and back left and right nobody, rarely can take down the mask, deep breath, from the wheat field slowly blowing warm air, people's spirit is also excited.

I was about to walk when my eyes fell on the old house again. Jade Phoenix Niang still stands there, has been looking to my side, see my vision sweep to, she beckons from a distance, I also wave back.
The old house is in decline. In the old days, my house yard was a busy square, where the polder road turned into a bend and reached deep into the dike. Front, back, left, right, all houses close together.

When the sun is shining, we like to sit on the floor of our house, carrying the table out to play Mahjong, sitting on a bench to eat melon seeds; when it rains, my aunts like to sit in my house, collecting the soles of my shoes, knitting sweaters together, and talking about trivial gossip.

If I cook in the kitchen, they are not polite, come in to look at what I am doing, is cooking, then praise on the word, "a few will do the celebration Oh! "
Now on this side of the old house, the family across the street has moved to Jiujiang, the family across the street to the city, the family in the back has built a new house and moved away... The people who grew up watching me, I haven't seen in years.

And we wouldn't have even considered building a new house if it weren't for the fact that old houses are so dilapidated that they leak everywhere when it rains and the walls have cracked in the past because of earthquakes.

The new house, which was built on a vegetable plot behind the polder, was five meters to the left and a row of houses in the past. On the right was a house next to one, but the people in the house often ate in the old house, so it was usually deserted, there's a vegetable patch in the back.

Usually the home is very quiet, occasionally someone to chat, is also something. After all, this is no longer a place for everyone to pass through. There is no need to come here specially.
I returned to the new house, the heart has not put down the Jade Phoenix Niang, then asked her mother's situation. Her mother said: "Her husband, you Kai Ye, a few years ago died of cancer. Now she lives alone. "

I asked, "doesn't she have three children? " My mother sighed. "I'm tired of being old. I'm tired of being old. All three of them have their own homes. None of them are pleasant. I'd rather live in my own house. "

Mother said Yufeng Niang home no TV, often to our new house here to see, a look is the majority of the day. Mother sometimes wanted to go out to work in the field, it is not easy to tell her. She had a TV at home, but it broke, and it never got fixed. Speaking of having three sons, no one wants to help.

"If it weren't for this plague, she wouldn't have come back. " Mother put the dishes in the cupboard, then he said: "Think of the sin, she does not know how to pass the time in the house alone. To see no see, to chat we all hide in the house, to wake up can not be trapped for a day... "
When my mother spoke, I suddenly remembered years ago, I came back from school at noon, the door of the house is locked, Jade Phoenix Niang saw me in the house field and so on, let me pass, "your mother son went to the river. "

My parents rented land across the Yangtze in Ruichang and spent half a month away from home. The Jade Phoenix Niang lets me go home to sit, arrived to have a meal a bit, let me come kitchen.

Cuttlefish stew ribs, Lotus root soup, small stir-fried meat... is the New Year's specifications, I was surprised to see her, she gave me a dish, "read thin. EAT MORE! Make yourself at home. " That meal, I ate particularly full.
Thinking about it, my mother sighed again: "when the plague is over, I will let you Yufengniang come over to watch TV. But then you should go too. " My mother looked at me, shaking his head, "every time she comes to my house, she always asks me if I will be back soon. I said I would be back in the new year. Now you are back, she can't come. "

I looked out of the window. It was getting dark. All the houses across the embankment were lit up. Is Lady Yu Feng home alone now? What's she doing? Staring, or sleeping? ... I don't know.

I had forgotten many of the details of her home, except that when I was eating, she touched my head, very gently, as if it had never happened. But I do. All the time.

In the evening, when I was cleaning the table with my mother, I talked about the Jade Phoenix.

Because when I went for a walk on the Yangtze River embankment in the evening, I passed by my family's old house and saw Yufengniang standing on the ground with her hands in a daze. I call her, she exulted loudly asked: "Qing Er, you back? " I said yes, she asked: "You back how long? I did not see you. " I said nearly a month.

She nodded and smiled. "I forgot you are at the end of the new house now, and I can't even see you. " By the count, I haven't seen her for nearly three years. At first glance, I felt that she had shrunk a lot, her face had become loose and her eyes were unfocused, his hands were shaking when he spoke.

After catching up with her, I went to the LEVEE. Standing on the dikes and looking back at us, the sun shone down and the undulating roofs glowed. Front and back left and right nobody, rarely can take down the mask, deep breath, from the wheat field slowly blowing warm air, people's spirit is also excited.

I was about to walk when my eyes fell on the old house again. Jade Phoenix Niang still stands there, has been looking to my side, see my vision sweep to, she beckons from a distance, I also wave back.

The old house is in decline. In the old days, my house yard was a busy square, where the polder road turned into a bend and reached deep into the dike. Front, back, left, right, all houses close together.

When the sun is shining, we like to sit on the floor of our house, carrying the table out to play Mahjong, sitting on a bench to eat melon seeds; when it rains, my aunts like to sit in my house, collecting the soles of my shoes, knitting sweaters together, and talking about trivial gossip.

If I cook in the kitchen, they are not polite, come in to look at what I am doing, is cooking, then praise on the word, "a few will do the celebration Oh! "

Now on this side of the old house, the family across the street has moved to Jiujiang, the family across the street to the city, the family in the back has built a new house and moved away... The people who grew up watching me, I haven't seen in years.

And we wouldn't have even considered building a new house if it weren't for the fact that old houses are so dilapidated that they leak everywhere when it rains and the walls have cracked in the past because of earthquakes.

The new house, which was built on a vegetable plot behind the polder, was five meters to the left and a row of houses in the past. On the right was a house next to one, but the people in the house often ate in the old house, so it was usually deserted, there's a vegetable patch in the back.

Usually the home is very quiet, occasionally someone to chat, is also something. After all, this is no longer a place for everyone to pass through. There is no need to come here specially.

I returned to the new house, the heart has not put down the Jade Phoenix Niang, then asked her mother's situation. Her mother said: "Her husband, you Kai Ye, a few years ago died of cancer. Now she lives alone. "

I asked, "doesn't she have three children? " My mother sighed. "I'm tired of being old. I'm tired of being old. All three of them have their own homes. None of them are pleasant. I'd rather live in my own house. "

Mother said Yufeng Niang home no TV, often to our new house here to see, a look is the majority of the day. Mother sometimes wanted to go out to work in the field, it is not easy to tell her. She had a TV at home, but it broke, and it never got fixed. Speaking of having three sons, no one wants to help.

"If it weren't for this plague, she wouldn't have come back. " Mother put the dishes in the cupboard, then he said: "Think of the sin, she does not know how to pass the time in the house alone. To see no see, to chat we all hide in the house, to wake up can not be trapped for a day... "

When my mother spoke, I suddenly remembered years ago, I came back from school at noon, the door of the house is locked, Jade Phoenix Niang saw me in the house field and so on, let me pass, "your mother son went to the river. "

My parents rented land across the Yangtze in Ruichang and spent half a month away from home. The Jade Phoenix Niang lets me go home to sit, arrived to have a meal a bit, let me come kitchen.

Cuttlefish stew ribs, Lotus root soup, small stir-fried meat... is the New Year's specifications, I was surprised to see her, she gave me a dish, "read thin. EAT MORE! Make yourself at home. " That meal, I ate particularly full.

Thinking about it, my mother sighed again: "when the plague is over, I will let you Yufengniang come over to watch TV. But then you should go too. " My mother looked at me, shaking his head, "every time she comes to my house, she always asks me if I will be back soon. I said I would be back in the new year. Now you are back, she can't come. "

I looked out of the window. It was getting dark. All the houses across the embankment were lit up. Is Lady Yu Feng home alone now? What's she doing? Staring, or sleeping? ... I don't know.

I had forgotten many of the details of her home, except that when I was eating, she touched my head, very gently, as if it had never happened. But I do. All the time.
